f57361d4-b9ec-4608-9803-99e353424f6a.name: Directional
f57361d4-b9ec-4608-9803-99e353424f6a.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

7b247613-ff95-4c0d-bf47-c5fbe1ce3feb.name: Tough Skin
7b247613-ff95-4c0d-bf47-c5fbe1ce3feb.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

e9778763-c020-4e0c-90df-f3c77d4097d3.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

a23d9f9c-4bf6-4385-8e2f-9db6b673aafb.name: Oxygen Storage
a23d9f9c-4bf6-4385-8e2f-9db6b673aafb.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

37c9f75b-c6e5-495f-979d-0df2271a272c.name: Oxygen Storage
37c9f75b-c6e5-495f-979d-0df2271a272c.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

72f6de3b-c298-415e-b2cd-7a1dc9e78f83.name: Oxygen Storage
72f6de3b-c298-415e-b2cd-7a1dc9e78f83.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

5eb4b85d-8e38-46a0-9d82-82145fa4e683.name: Oxygen Storage
5eb4b85d-8e38-46a0-9d82-82145fa4e683.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

b3b7c9a9-b46e-493f-963c-a6611f6ce36a.name: Oxygen Storage
b3b7c9a9-b46e-493f-963c-a6611f6ce36a.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

028264a5-f889-4ac9-a2da-5cea19143299.name: Flexibility (Double-Jointed)
028264a5-f889-4ac9-a2da-5cea19143299.notes: May ignore up to -5 in penalties for close quarters

1645e941-51d5-4ede-ad73-708b0cf21e34.name: High Pain Threshold
1645e941-51d5-4ede-ad73-708b0cf21e34.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured

features.situation: on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning

3c35d9f8-217c-4702-99df-17f53352c90a.name: Know Your Own Strength Variant Price

febcd249-9885-47f7-97a3-7ce9673fbc83.name: Longevity
febcd249-9885-47f7-97a3-7ce9673fbc83.notes: You fail aging rolls only on a 17 or 18, or only on an 18 if your modified HT is 17 or better

654a4679-2d38-4367-b8da-503c938cd8b0.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

0340d14a-7151-43aa-866b-27e37300b19d.name: Diffuse
0340d14a-7151-43aa-866b-27e37300b19d.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

46c5d934-104b-454d-8421-44fab6f71f49.name: Homogenous
46c5d934-104b-454d-8421-44fab6f71f49.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

64454267-3ce4-4830-8703-84617ac659f8.name: No Blood
64454267-3ce4-4830-8703-84617ac659f8.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

104cdbd8-ce12-44fa-a42a-9be814ea4dc1.name: No Brain
104cdbd8-ce12-44fa-a42a-9be814ea4dc1.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

24b70495-cad7-4b0e-a0f5-fb2b6f6c2f20.name: No Eyes
24b70495-cad7-4b0e-a0f5-fb2b6f6c2f20.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

08f93d1c-ccd8-470e-8096-a0fbc551dff1.name: No Head
08f93d1c-ccd8-470e-8096-a0fbc551dff1.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

4104b4a0-73c4-49cf-8ea6-465cf0537343.name: No Neck
4104b4a0-73c4-49cf-8ea6-465cf0537343.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

46b1a386-3ce3-4d0c-97d9-2cfda8a7837b.name: No Vitals
46b1a386-3ce3-4d0c-97d9-2cfda8a7837b.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

972781f3-388c-4988-b52e-916801836fea.name: Unliving
972781f3-388c-4988-b52e-916801836fea.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

bfc6b6cd-7a0b-4837-b50d-ed02c2c4c5d0.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points

4d71e633-82a0-4eae-ab40-8b0412ad6ef9.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

429498ba-fadc-4156-ac81-222963e46f79.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

70206025-a15d-413e-88f7-42f1c81156ed.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

1d2a9547-9ab8-4b2e-b7a4-75355cc22331.name: Hidebound
1d2a9547-9ab8-4b2e-b7a4-75355cc22331.notes: -2 penalty on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage.

3af911f4-acde-461b-bc6a-669871ef0daa.name: Incurious
3af911f4-acde-461b-bc6a-669871ef0daa.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident
